findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change various parameters and settings, including fees, transaction amounts, charity addresses, and more.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
